talks.title: The Future of JavaScript
talks.description: A deep dive into the next features of JavaScript and how they will shape the future of web development.

talks.title: Advanced CSS Techniques
talks.description: Learn about the latest and greatest CSS features, including Grid, Flexbox, and custom properties.

talks.title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
talks.description: An in-depth look at how to build and deploy scalable and resilient APIs using Node.js and Express.

talks.title: State of the Web: A 2026 Perspective
talks.description: A high-level overview of the current and future trends in the web development industry.

talks.title: Frontend Frameworks: A Comparative Analysis
talks.description: A comprehensive comparison of the most popular frontend frameworks: React, Vue, and Angular.

talks.title: WebAssembly: The Next Frontier
talks.description: Explore the power of WebAssembly and how it's enabling near-native performance in the browser.
